title: Navigate forwards to a menu button in reading mode
instructions: With the reading cursor on the 'Navigate forwards from here' link, navigate to the 'WAI-ARIA Quick Links' menu button.

title: Navigate backwards to a menu button in reading mode
instructions: With the reading cursor on the 'Navigate backwards from here' link, navigate to the 'WAI-ARIA Quick Links' menu button.

title: Request information about a menu button in reading mode
instructions: With the reading cursor on the 'WAI-ARIA Quick Links', read information about the menu button.

title: Open a menu in reading mode
instructions: With the reading cursor on the 'WAI-ARIA Quick Links' menu button, open the menu.
assertions: roleMenu nameWaiAriaQuickLinks roleFocusedItemMenuItem nameFocusedItemW3cHomePage positionFocusedItemMenu1 numberItemsMenu6

title: Open a menu to the last item in interaction mode
instructions: With focus on the 'WAI-ARIA Quick Links' menu button, open the menu.

title: Request information about a menu item in interaction mode
instructions: With focus on the 'W3C Home Page' menu item, read information about the item.

title: Navigate to the first item in a menu in interaction mode
instructions: With focus on the 'Accessible Name and Description' menu item, navigate to the 'W3C Home Page' menu item.

title: Navigate to the last item in a menu in interaction mode
instructions: With focus on the 'W3C Home Page' menu item, navigate to the 'Accessible Name and Description' menu item.

title: Navigate to an item in a menu by typing a character in interaction mode
instructions: With focus on the 'W3C Home Page' menu item, type a character to navigate to a different menu item.

title: Close a menu in interaction mode
instructions: With focus on the 'W3C Home Page' menu item, close the menu.
